text: Lois Ruth Maxwell (born Lois Ruth Hooker, 14 February 1927 – 29 September 2007) was a Canadian actress. She was best known for her role of Miss Moneypenny in the first 14 James Bond movies (1962–1985). She was the first actress to play the part. == References == == Other websites == * * * Obituary in The Times, 1 October 2007 * "Miss Moneypenny Lives Here", Australian Broadcasting Corporation, 14 January 2005 Category:1927 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Actresses who played Miss Moneypenny Category:Cancer deaths in Australia Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian stage actors Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:Actors from Kitchener, Ontario
title: Lois Maxwell
